users.name: Zeniliya Desuza
users.description: The main thrust of Godan is to arouse the humanitarian attitude in man so that society learns to move on the path of socialism and a happy world. The novel presents a synthesis of art and society, man and his age. The novelist has expressed his views on religion, caste, social set-up and community in realistic manner.

users.name: Amelia
users.description:
A computer is an electronic device that takes in raw data, processes it, and produces an output. It can perform mathematical and logical operations, and save the output for later use. 
Some basic components of a computer include:
Motherboard
Central Processing Unit (CPU)
Graphical Processing Unit (GPU)
Random Access Memory (RAM)
Storage device 
Some types of computers include:
Analog computers, Digital computers, Supercomputers, Mainframe computers, Minicomputers, Personal computers (PCs) or microcomputers. 
Computer systems can help people perform complex tasks with speed and accuracy. Automated processes can save time and effort, which can lead to increased productivity.

users.name: Olivia
users.description:
Travel and tourism is the activities of people traveling to and staying in places outside their usual environment for leisure, business, or other purposes. 
The travel and tourism sector includes a wide range of products and services, such as:
Leisure and business travel
Accommodation
Food and drink services
Hotels
Short-term rentals
Cruises
Meetings and events
Online travel agencies 
The tourism industry revolves around providing enjoyment and pleasurable experiences. It creates jobs, strengthens the local economy, contributes to local infrastructure development and can help to conserve the natural environment and cultural assets and traditions. 
Some types of tourism include:
